Who am I?

I am currently a sophmore at Staten Island Technical High School. Even though I am a sophomore, I only came to this school for about a week, so that makes my experience in this school no more than a freshman. In addition, I am also currently about AP Computer Science Principles, in this class we are learning to create websites using Javascript. Besides AP Computer Science, I am also learning more about Algebra 2, Russian, and many more.
